summary: The diff implements the requested Weekly Progress Chart data fix by unwrapping optional backend date shapes before normalization and recalculating all weekly stats from the filtered current-week task list reactively on `tasks` changes. Some additional non-requested changes update meta/state summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata indicating new feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) and statuses in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to fix Weekly Progress Chart logic; it did not request modifying repository project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository-wide frontend file summary documentation.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request updating documentation/summaries; only code changes to fix Weekly Progress Chart calculations/binding were requested.
